name: Strip Fighter ZERO
description:
Game Overview

The bawdy spoof filled origin game of the "Strip Fighter" series of 90's style 2D fighting games finally hits the scene!


An underground fighting tournament filled with deadly fighters and martial artists.
Their fierce battle for supremacy is about to unfold!

Characters

Practitioner of the deadly frozen fist fighting style. Yuki

A female fighter whose diligent martial arts training has made her master of her own fists.

The untameable princess. Martha

A young lady whose threw herself into the fighting ring in search of excitement.

The wrestling semi-pro. Amada

A newbie wrestler desperate to show the world she's got what it takes to go pro.

The lost cat girl. Mikan

A girl in search of her missing owner.

The lone wolf female fighter. Jerry

A lady brawler forever in search of stronger and more worthy opponents.

Disciple of the Suiryuken. Suirei

Entered the tournament to win and prove once and for all the incredible power of her ancient martial art.

The underground brawler. S

A dangerous man who derives pleasure from twisting and wrenching bodies into a pulp.

Master of carnal desires. Archsuccubus

A wicked demoness who set up a fighting tournament as a trap to lure in powerful fighters and feast on their lustful vigor.

Gameplay

Strip Combo
A powerful and deadly special move that requires STRIP gauge to activate.
Execute by pressing ↓→↓→ + Attack button.
Has three levels of strength, with the most powerful version costing the most energy to use.
Use weak attack to activate level 1, medium attack for level 2, and strong attack to activate the level 3 strip combo.

Strip Rush
Activate with X+A+B(R) and requires one bar of RUSH gauge to activate.
For a limited time, all your attacks become cancelable.
Your RUSH gauge fills slowly over time, increases every time you take damage, and resets after each round.
The more filled your gauge is, the longer the effect and the initial activation time-stop will last.

Game Features

  • 8 highly stylized and unique playable characters
  • Fast paced game-play that rewards an aggressive play-style
  • Tons of exciting over-the-top special attack animations
  • Story Mode where you can fight against CPU opponents
  • VS mode where you can battle with/against your favorite characters
  • Training mode where you can practice moves and specials with no limits.

DirectPlay must be installed in order to play this game

DirectPlay is required to play this game.

If DirectPlay is not installed on your computer, you will be prompted to install it when the game is launched for the first time.

If you cancel the DirectPlay installation or if it does not install correctly, please follow the below steps to activate it:
1. Press Windows Key + R.
2. Type "appwiz.cpl" in the text box and press enter.
3. Click on "Turn Windows features on or off".
4. Check "Legacy Components >DirectPlay.
